<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// UnknownPadding - Return the worst case padding that could result from</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// unknown offset bits.  This does not include alignment padding caused by</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// known offset bits.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// @param KnownBits Number of known low offset bits.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aca36878e37b708e22ace80dececead61"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">inline</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aca36878e37b708e22ace80dececead61">UnknownPadding</a>(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a> Alignment, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits">KnownBits</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Alignment.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align/#a80735739b49cf97a491922c8f9af2cc1">value</a>() - (1ull &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits">KnownBits</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// BasicBlockInfo - Information about the offset and size of a single</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// basic block.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/basicblockinfo"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">struct </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/basicblockinfo/#a6fec3f0b886c81f10897cccfba57e904">BasicBlockInfo</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Offset - Distance from the beginning of the function to the beginning</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// of this basic block.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Offsets are computed assuming worst case padding before an aligned</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// block. This means that subtracting basic block offsets always gives a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// conservative estimate of the real distance which may be smaller.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Because worst case padding is used, the computed offset of an aligned</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// block may not actually be aligned.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/basicblockinfo/#acadf079e9232969cd61ca5744b10dd16"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/basicblockinfo/#acadf079e9232969cd61ca5744b10dd16">Offset</a> = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Size - Size of the basic block in bytes.  If the block contains</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// inline assembly, this is a worst case estimate.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// The size does not include any alignment padding whether from the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// beginning of the block, or from an aligned jump table at the end.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/basicblockinfo/#a1b26f2a8fbde15592af8af3fb950d8fc"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/basicblockinfo/#a1b26f2a8fbde15592af8af3fb950d8fc">Size</a> = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// KnownBits - The number of low bits in Offset that are known to be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// exact.  The remaining bits of Offset are an upper bound.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/basicblockinfo/#a57a9e20cafe54e922aeead667cdd73ff"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint8&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/basicblockinfo/#a57a9e20cafe54e922aeead667cdd73ff">KnownBits</a> = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Unalign - When non-zero, the block contains instructions (inline asm)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// of unknown size.  The real size may be smaller than Size bytes by a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// multiple of 1 &lt;&lt; Unalign.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/basicblockinfo/#aadef2620c9e7d116fda27a2d9edbd125"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint8&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/basicblockinfo/#aadef2620c9e7d116fda27a2d9edbd125">Unalign</a> = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// PostAlign - When &gt; 1, the block terminator contains a .align</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// directive, so the end of the block is aligned to PostAlign bytes.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/basicblockinfo/#a3322f1dcf981856028e4ec195de0024d"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/basicblockinfo/#a3322f1dcf981856028e4ec195de0024d">PostAlign</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/basicblockinfo/#a6fec3f0b886c81f10897cccfba57e904"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/basicblockinfo/#a6fec3f0b886c81f10897cccfba57e904">BasicBlockInfo</a>() = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">default</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Compute the number of known offset bits internally to this block.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// This number should be used to predict worst case padding when</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// splitting the block.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/basicblockinfo/#a5f264104cc3a87ed07dd196d281ccd2c"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/basicblockinfo/#a5f264104cc3a87ed07dd196d281ccd2c">internalKnownBits</a>()</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Bits = <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/basicblockinfo/#aadef2620c9e7d116fda27a2d9edbd125">Unalign</a> ? <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/basicblockinfo/#aadef2620c9e7d116fda27a2d9edbd125">Unalign</a> : <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/basicblockinfo/#a57a9e20cafe54e922aeead667cdd73ff">KnownBits</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the block size isn&#39;t a multiple of the known bits, assume the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// worst case padding.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/basicblockinfo/#a1b26f2a8fbde15592af8af3fb950d8fc">Size</a> &amp; ((1u &lt;&lt; Bits) - 1))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Bits = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a57d2f9ee99e9e68cff564d0d579c8163">llvm::countr&#95;zero</a>(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/basicblockinfo/#a1b26f2a8fbde15592af8af3fb950d8fc">Size</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Bits;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Compute the offset immediately following this block.  If Align is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// specified, return the offset the successor block will get if it has</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// this alignment.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/basicblockinfo/#a96d35759d0115509c273fbdfd8fe011a"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/basicblockinfo/#a96d35759d0115509c273fbdfd8fe011a">postOffset</a>(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a> Alignment = <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a>(1))</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> PO = <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/basicblockinfo/#acadf079e9232969cd61ca5744b10dd16">Offset</a> + <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/basicblockinfo/#a1b26f2a8fbde15592af8af3fb950d8fc">Size</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a> PA = std::max(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/basicblockinfo/#a3322f1dcf981856028e4ec195de0024d">PostAlign</a>, Alignment);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (PA == <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a>(1))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> PO;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Add alignment padding from the terminator.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> PO + <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aca36878e37b708e22ace80dececead61">UnknownPadding</a>(PA, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/basicblockinfo/#a5f264104cc3a87ed07dd196d281ccd2c">internalKnownBits</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Compute the number of known low bits of postOffset.  If this block</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// contains inline asm, the number of known bits drops to the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// instruction alignment.  An aligned terminator may increase the number</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// of know bits.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// If LogAlign is given, also consider the alignment of the next block.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/basicblockinfo/#a9fcaddb16aceac174b38bb7bc118bdfe"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/basicblockinfo/#a9fcaddb16aceac174b38bb7bc118bdfe">postKnownBits</a>(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a> = <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">llvm::Align</a>(1))</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
